body: I mean sure it said a random girl appeared out of nowhere in MC's house, but who is she and why is she here? Why is she naked? The author never said, and did the mc act out his fantasy, it was also not imply, so why the rape tag? It was just a unfilled story i that was not needed in a hentai manga.
With translation, I still don't know whats going on.
Without an english trans. I have no clue what is actually going on here.
